values: I have a livejournal again.... _imallergic

yea... if anyone is trying to get ahold of me... it will be a little while. the fam is officially moving friday. they're going to myrtle beach. i'll be staying with dell and dee. much love. xox p.. i also got my hair chopped off... looks okay. will post pics soon.

they took the van last night.

i have to be packed by sunday. my mommy is leaving me...

xo

getting my hair chopped off today as well.

<center>thanksgiving break was lame. i was super sick the whole time and worked everyday, but thursday. i guess it is good, cause i'll have some dough for christmas presents and such... if i don't get fired that is. i was 30 minutes late. [over-slept]. oops.
godzilla... final wars. comes out today. it's the 50th anniversary of the premiere of godzilla. or so i'm told. hehe.

i want to chop off my hair soooo bad. gotta wait till i get a day off.

i also found this amazing art boy. www.jasonshogreen.com. this guy is sofuckingamazing. and he's <font color=pink>asian.</font> xoxoxox
i got a job. subway... eat fresh.

this weekend was decent. friday, louise&clint, natalie&duck, heath, wes&kalen, joe&kasey, and me, went to see 'saw' but ended up going to the incredibles, because not everyone was 17. it was pretty good. saturday, went to the portfolio review in atlanta... extremely stressful. i did, however, get very helpful feedback. i want to look into going to rhode island school of design... or possibly auburn. i want to feel like i've actually gotten somewhere in my college search. i've only narrowed it down to about 3847 schools. last night i had a dream about skateboarding so james is teaching me. i 'skated' for 2 and a half hours. not sure what kind of progress i made, but i'm trying. tonight is the Nickelodeon Cartoon Film Festival so i'm completely stoked. natalie's having a masquerade [sp??] ball for her birthday. SUCH a rockin idea. xox

i have now invested over 17 hours playing fable on the new xbox. i am so a junkie. today was the most wonderful day. i do wish life was less complicated tho. it's not as easy as go or stay. went shopping yesterday at lenox. urban outfitters has to be the most happeninest store ever created. xoxo

this weekend was swell. went and saw the grudge... the initial jump factor was a 10+++ but not all that scary. i am a fan of jap horror, but i don't think the plot/setting was all that exciting. i give it an overall 7. i foooound my cell phone. ahh. that modern shield called technology. mal and i are fighting. :( i think i might be moving. far away. xo   ps...listen to 'god hates kansas'

<center>the boy's car is broken. he borrowed mine and i played follow-your-boyfriend-to-work-day. his boss is like 19 so it wasn't a big deal. i have to say... that is defately a job i will <strike>never</strike><big>never</big> do by choice. we went to this one house. it was really scary and really sad that humans lived there. the fact that they ordered pizza is odd, too. they had about 10 dogs. when we pulled up, a woman peeked out of the door and the dogs went nuts. she went inside for a moment and i half expected her to come out with a raw piece of animal to throw to them so they'd behave. *eeek!* <hr>
i think my mother is moving away without me. to myrtle beach. which is far away. and i am not going. national portfolio day is at the atlanta college of art on nov 6. we are taking a car pool. i'm sikkkkkked. also, going to visit SCAD on october 8. 
<hr>
tonight dad taught me how to stain wood. i laughed at james for having ghetto door handles and i think i jinxed myself because now mine looks the same as his. the door opens by pulling a wire. ew. </center>

we were somewhere around barstow, on the edge of the desert, when the drugs began to take hold. i remember saying something like "i feel a bit light headed, maybe you should drive..." and suddenly there was a terrible roar all around us and the sky was full of what looked like huge bats, all swooping and screeching and diving around the car, and a voice screaming: "holy jesus! what are these goddamn animals?" nevermind, it's your turn to drive. no point in mentioning those bats, i thought, the poor bastard will see them soon enough. xoxox

aja and i colored. we drove around for like an hour looking for the pivot in cleveland. last november was playing. no luck so we ate mcdonalds and went to the homecoming game. tamara carson got homecoming queen. [like it was even a contest]. it was comletely out of sympathy. my opinion at least. aja is tiny and brown instructions from aja written in code aja's half of the board my half of the board... i'm not exactly sure of the reason i took pictures. the end. james has had to work the past 2 sundays. sundays are supposed to be his day off. yea right.

finally got the tat. it was an excellent birthday present to myself. :) not really. mommy paid for it and mallory held my hand the whole time. it took about 2 hours or so and i still have to go in and get shading on the scales. it's a koi fish located below my right boob, on my rib cage. i would have taken a pic as soon as i got it but it was considerably discusting. bloody and such. new email addy is:: lizispink@yahoo.com the storm was bad. pitts park was completely flooded... probably around 3 or 4 feet of water. no school today though, with wasn't so bad.

OMFG. yesterday was one of the most amazing i've ever had. i have to say, this birthday is definately shaping up to be number 18 worthy. ************************************************** yes, yes... they're all blurry honey bunny <33 james looks quite forced :/ james took me to upstart fest (pt. 2). we arrived at about 1:30. i brought a can of chef boy-r-dee (sp??) and a plastic fork so i wouldn't have to buy food. the first couple bands were okay. (futureheads, delays, the whigs) then we got in line to meet franz ferdinand. i was sooo nervous. after like an hour and some odd minutes... i got them to sign my shirt and a card for mallory. i just said hi and thank you. they were all very quiet. until i got to the last guy... nicholas (guitar/keyboard/some vocals). he made a little conversation about the card and how it was from their last tour. then i said "can i hug you????" he just laughed at me and said yes. some guy was taking pictures of me being a groupie. ha. watched the scissor sisters next... awesome flaming homosexual 80's-sounding dance music. watched the killers. ************************************************** then last of course was franz. james helped me fight my way nearly to the front. we waiting patiently in the mass of body heat and sweat thro for about another hour until they came on. i screamed my lungs out and sang the whole time. it was the most amazing time of my life. boyfriends are not so bad. nether is life. <3 xoxoxox
i got my nipples pierced. ouch. xox

tonight was nice. debra hired someone else to work friday nights. :( whatever i'm quitting. went to the game for a few minutes. for the first time i was actually supportive of the RAIDERS. they falsely convinced me they had talent. we didn't have to pay though, then stopped by the penny II [aj's new venue]. just stopped by to say hello to spencer and adrienne and check it out. it was very nice. i finally got a picture album. i probably sorted 200 or more photos [more than one tiem because i dropped them twice.] next is to mallory's. we plan to go yard saling at 8 am tomorrow. i haven't gone since my aunt dawn died. *much excitement!!!*

ringling is amazing. as anyone who is even slightly interrested in art should be amazed by such stunning student work. my goal from this point til graduation is to get in. that's it. i care about nothing else. ;) my birthday is nearing... 3 weeks from today and i'll have a beautiful symbol of courage forever inked into my flesh. school is going superbly. williams has agreed to PAY for my poloroid film as i am testing 'polaroid transfers'. [as seen in crazy//beautiful] *sqeal* it's amazing how open minded teachers can be. school isn't so bad. xox

i didn't go to school today. i've slept for probably thirty some hours in the past 3 days. odd. james is very sick as well. a different kind of sick though... a 'natural' sick if you will. stayed at mal's night before last. we rented identity and eurotrip. eurotrip was funny... tipical 'teen' humor. identity kicked ass... unitil the end. i was a bit annoyed but it was still really good. and as always john cusack is one of my movie heros. none the less it was a bit scary and equally creepy. haven't really eaten much... life is plain. addrienne has decided to forgive and forget i believe. very odd. <33

school is going well. i'm in the library getting quizzed on every aspect of my social life by a freshman. she just told some guy to 'lick her clit'... definately a new one to me. this is the first challenging thing i've had to do today. i haven't heard from james. :( less than a month until i get my tattoo. *yeah!!* very exciting stuff. i've made a comitment to become a computer geek. i'm so going to learn how to rock at html. white girls that think they aren't is one of the most annoying things in the world. other than girls who feel the need to talk as loud as possible in the highest pitch possible as well. grrr. i guess there is a reason i don't have sleep-overs and long telephone conversations. xox

new style and such. louise is SPENDING the night. like whoa.

Adopt Your Own Emo Kid!
...

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#00cc66">finally</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#33ffcc"> got to see louise and heath. funny how i went to open house for north hall and not habersham. the art dept is a million times better there anyway. senior pics were shit. got my hair cut. shooort in the back. will post pics as soon as i learn how. my pig tails/pony tail is about an inch long. i decided i like school okay. it's okay as long as i'm not the public taxi... which is rare. because i'm the only one of my friends that drives, i'm basically obligated. $30 for a parking pass is bullshit. i'm growing some triops. there these lab raised prehistoric horeshoe crab looking creatures that start off as microscopic eggs. neat-o.

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#cc66ff">summer</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#cc55ff"> is drawing to a close. i'm dreading school. good news is i'll hopefully only have 3 acedemics... leaving me with 5 art classes. last year. warped was interresting. saw louise. kim, james, ninja turtle and i all rocked out then crashed in buckhead. we decorated the walls with glow stick juice. the boys were going to skate atlanta but james left his skate shoes by the pool and someone stole them. that and we were all broke. senior photos got rescheduled until thursday. mark is back. missed yoga this week but i plan to continue this wednesday. still working 11 hour shifts at the job i tried to quit. i need to tweeze my eyebrows. xoxox

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#ccccff">the</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#ff99ff"> time is 4:22. not really sure why i'm still awake but i am. kim, aja, james and nacho were over. saw amanda today. 2nd time this summer. i'm so glad i'm home from florida. got a new lens for the camera. it's fisheye so that'll kick ass once it finally gets here. next weekend is my last weekend to work 10 hour shifts. *score* watched once upon a time in mexico. desperado is much better. also watched shade and three blind mice. drawing on bodies with the black sharpie. eating blue pringles. yes blue. amor is dolor.</font>
<font size="3" face="arial" color="ccffcc">Coming from you/Friend is a four letter word/End is the only part of the word/That I heard/Call me morbid or absurd/But/To me/Coming from you/Friend is a four letter word/When I go fishing for the words/I am wishing you would say to me,/I am really only praying that/The words you'll soon be saying/Might betray/The way you feel about me</font>

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#cc66ff">so</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#cc55ff">... finally an update. jersey trip was cancelled. still had to pay for the ticket tho which sucks. summer is beautiful. i am back to regular sleeping agan. or as regular as it can be. i can actually sleep in now. james and i have spent like everyday together since i've been back. one thing i don't understand tho is how someone can be so fake. how can anyone be satisfied with living a lie. a constant day to day bullshit. some people do it quite confidently as a matter of fact. uncomprehendable. i shall not even try. i am going to quit my job. kisses.

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#000099">i</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#663399"> wish i was asleep this morning at 1:30 am when ryan ebbs called me... at least then i'd know for sure i was dreaming. we talked about everything... he's thinking about moving to maryland. this trip to florida i've been realizing i need to stop pushing things. so i did. he promised me a date at the thai dish so i told him he has to come back to do that. then he said he was hoping maybe i could come to new jersey. i asked him to repeat himself about 4 times just to be sure that's exactly what he said. i couldn't sleep after that of course so i left clearwater at about 3:30 am and came to tampa. i watched tv and ate some noodles and pondered for about an hour all the reasons my mom should let me go. 

this morning i got up and took and extra long shower, preparing the speech for the madre. so i called her and all i said was 'how would you feel about me going to nj??' she immediately said, 'oh you can go hunny.' i just about shit my pants right then and there in the taco bell drive through line. so, hotel party is canceled... or on hold for now. i'll be back from jersey the 9th. all i need now is to be diagnosed with terminal cancer so i kno this is too good to be true... life is fucking beautiful. xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxox

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#0000ff">for</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#0099ff"> some reason i've been avoiding writing in the livejornal. guess i'm just being lazy. only 8 days left till i'm home *yay!* today has been overly stressful. i got up early and played tennis with dad in the fla sun... i think i stayed in it too long with no h2o because i've been feeling a lil crappy since then. dad and i shared a ride today and i went to work at 2. i grabbed some soup from Selmon's and had to work alone for like an hour or so which is SUPER scary because i still don't kno how to do everything. went okay. guests were complaining all day. i don't even care anymore. oh oh but good news... hotel party july 6. everyone's invited. buckhead. post reply for det.s or call me 706.499.2231. i miss home so bad! 

i had the weirdest dream the other night. it was like i lived on this huge... colony in the forest. everything was larger than life... it was almost like i was a tiny little fairy that lived in the grass. all these other people were there and there was a humongous tree. the tree was almost like a central 'brain' that made decisions for everyone. it was like no one knew what free will was or even cared to know. i kept trying to tell everyone but no one would listen. then i fell in love with a man with dark hair and dark eyes. he was from somewhere far away and beautiful. that's all i remember. xoxox

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#0000ff">tonight</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#0099ff"> i'm working night shift for the first time. i'm online in the back office. it's totally boring and there's 3 of us working instead of 2. which means there is waaaay nothing to do. ray is at camp apparently getting laid so it can't be too bad. too busy to talk to me. whatever. florida is already boring and i'm ready to be home... i'm out of money and i still owe dad $490 dollars:). he made me write out a 'contract' with him (lame). i'm working a shit load this week and even doing housekeeping on my day off. i'm feeling all whiney and sorry for myself. i wish people would stop lying to me. i hate thinking everyone is so innocent... but how can i make the assumption that everyone will hurt me in the end? maybe it's true...

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#ff6699">b</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#ffcc33">eauty once again exists in the world. yesterday i had to work, and it pains me to say so, but it was a blast. steph and i just messed around the whole time. she plucked my eyebrows and we talked about pooping. i got a cell phone (finally). it's a camera phone but i haven't really figured out how to send the pics yet. mom called me from hans. she passed the phone to the boss lady who told me she loved me and missed me. then they passed to phone to everyone that was working and i talked to all of them for a bit. it made me cry a bit, but not so much in a sad way.

last night, my brother, my dad and i all went to these tiny redneck races. i wasn't aware that florida had an area like habersham. it was so awesome. i'm going next saturday to watch the school bus figure 8's. mwahaha.

i hear louise has a boyfriend which is sofreakincool. ryan is loving his new job. ray is off to summer camp. court and i have made amends. i am ready to be home. 2 weeks down, 3 to go.

6:35am... i officially smashed into a cement post at the gas station in my dad's lexus. 7:02am, i got to work, few minutes late, bawling my head off. work was really busy so it went by fast. 2:00pm had a front desk meeting until 4pm. went to get an estimate... $2000 was the cheap one. the 2nd place had to get back to me. Thank god dad's being understanding. he's only making me pay $500. if it was fixed with my insurance that would be the deductable. 6:00pm i went to graphic design class and got slapped in the face with 2 more projects in addition to my 1 in progect. did get an a on the other one though. 9:00pm i headed to clearwater. the way the condos work, it's easiest to walk through an alley way to the other side of the building. tonight was the first time i did it at night. i think for sure i tripped on a severed limb in the dark. i didn't slow down to look back. i came to the net cafe in hopes that time would be wasted more interrestingly. i need hugs. **hello teacher tell me what's my lesson? look right through me, look right through me. i find it kinda funny, i find it kinda sad. the dreams in which I'm dying, are the best I've ever had**

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#cc66ff">t</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#cc55ff">oday was a flash from the past. i went to fort myers to see the ray boy. he grew up. a beautiful boy. driving and all. cell phone, too. it's so odd. it's also odd to know that i have known him longer than all of the people i see on a day-to-day basis. 'drive all night, to hold you tight, back to california. days went by, we waited and i guess we're getting older. we couldn't win in the end. you're gone.' i just had one of the most refreshing showers i have ever had in my life. after the drive to fort myers and back (approx. 2 h each way) and the driving all over town, i could probably season food with the amount of sweat residue on my body. regardless it was so discusting. i kno i smelled like butt... he smelled nice, too. i met greg and michael as well. interresting characters those 2 are, the like 15 minutes i actually spent around them (playing video games not counted). i feel so different. like emotion just took a steaming shit on my face. i keep thinking about the future. and the past. *sigh* ahhh make it stop. so it goes. i wish gas wasn't so expensive. i would drive forever. 'waking up all alone, sending postcards back to home, from the road.' work at 7 am tomorrow.

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#ccccff">n</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#ff99ff">o phone is making me lose my mind. my cell is temporarily out-of-order. i ran it through the washing machine. no not on purpose. it will be like the 5th insurance claim i've made though so i highly doubt i'll get any discount on the price. i got off work this morning but had to go take to SAT's :( i did terrible i kno. i accidentally skipped like 5 questions. which sucks because there really aren't a lot of questions. mark g called me and i only heard 6 of his 7 digits. ahhhh maybe if mal calls me i'll be able to get bushy's #, thus getting mark's #. i'm at the internet cafe. i just got a smoothie for $4. completely non-a. and it tastes not so great. graphic design project due tuesday. i was working on it till 12 this am. the only reason i had to stop is because my xacto knife was so dull that the paper only ripped when i tried to cut it. my fingers were black goo with glue residue. only 3 minutes left on my pricing plan so i must go. brainfreeze.

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#ffcc33">a</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#ffff33">nother day in the fla. today was a pretty good day. went out in the ocean this morning. i put on sfp 30 and still got burned to a crisp. was planning on going to ft.myers to see the ray today but didn't have enough time. i am planning on going down sunday after church so i'll be there all day. went shopping and got lots of nice things at extremely cheap discounts [;). memorial day sale and all. got the newest sugarcult cd. it's delicious. work is at 7 am tomorrow morning. ick. tennis lesson after that and class after that. busy busy day tomorrow. it was nice having a long weekend tho. said my last good-bye's to ry this night. he is off to his new job. nebraska, ny, texas... i haven't talked to mark gragg in a good bit. only one call since we've been in the fla places. maybe if he's okay with it i can go see him sunday as well. i drank margarita's with joe at the beach on saturday. he's very goofy. for some odd reason i think i like being sad... or maybe just listening to sad music. 'how long i'll wait just to say goodbye...'

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#00cc66">h</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#33ffcc">ow did this happen? florida is a beautiful place. all of the sudden things are working for me. for once. i met a guy. he's 22. his name is joe. no last name yet. super sweet and brown. i met him when dad and i were watching ferris bueller's day off. it was really funny, he kept trying to talk to me and i was super scared that dad would freak out so i wasn't saying much. then he's like, 'is that your dad?'. i wanted to see him again so i put my # in my phone and pointed the screen in his direction. he got the hint and called me today. dad and i went bowling, too. i bowled a 71 and a 135. mark g called me. he's pretty busy, tho. i am on talking terms with courtney. mal and bushy are together and happy. i'm going on a road trip in july and seeing the ray man. ryan wants to take me out to eat when he gets back from his job deal. the guy i hit in dad's car said he'll most likely pay for it himself. dad said he's gonna get his car buffed and prob not even fixed. AND i've got more than 75 cents in my checking account. i need to take a hiatus more often. i think i was trying waaay to hard to be happy, rather than just letting things be. thank god i finally opened my eyes. or closed them rather... not sure. is this a sign that everything good's happening just so it can be shitty? am i lying to myself again? yummy, i don't care. i'm happy. kisses for all. <3.

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#000099">o</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#663399">nce again it's 2am and i find myself alone and in the dark, in front of a computer screen, unable to close my eyes for more than 5 minutes. maybe it's because my x best friend of forever gained self-confidence and beauty from me and i gained nothing but hurt from her. or maybe it's because i just wrecked my dad's lexus. or maybe it's because i'm in a strange place with nothing to do on a summer night. or maybe it's the 3 amp's i chugged at 4 o'clock this afternoon. my brain is so ready to explode. i have $375 and i'm hoping that's enough to pay for dad's vehicle and the guy's i hit. i'm such a bad driver. i wish i could take a taxi everywhere. i hate driving. everyone seems so far away. mark is somewhere in cocoa beach. i miss him already. i tried calling his cell but still no luck. he's supposed to call bushy tomorrow. i just hope he's having fun, where ever he is. i feel like the whole world's asleep. i have to be at work at 10 am and i work until 6. guess all that money'll be going to dad. why do they put like 2 ft long windows on the back of ambulances?? i saw the most disturbing thing the other night. no blood, but i had to follow behind this ambulance for like 10 miles. i saw them hook up and IV. it was like a horror movie come true. i guess it's stupid being so emotional over someone i've never even met before... but regardless, it was super scary. started graphic design tonight. ate a veggie burger for lunch, and one for dinner. everyone that's on aim has been idle for at least 7 hours.

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#cc66ff">g</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#ff6699">oing to the airport in about... 5 minutes. i'll be gone all of june. in a way i'm happy. i need a little hiatus (sp??) from the day-to-dayness of the habersham area. i will get to see mark gragg while i'm down there. supposedly when school starts again we're going to be together. i'm not so sure that'll happen though. either way he's in florida as well. cocoa beach. doesn't that just sooound wonderful? i got a new cell phone. you're welcome who ever stole my old one. it cost me $50 to replace it, but that's better than $200 i suppose. EVERYone give me your numbers again. or call my phone. 499.2231. this weekend was pretty crazy. friday i partied at mark b's (graduation... congrats everyone!!). it was cool, i met a guy named jason, and one named eric, and one named brent. and scott, and cody. hehe. anyway i got home at 5 am. still alive and all. saturday i worked all day and went to mal's with bushy, mark and james. i'm really glad he finally talked to me one last time. his gf dia really dislikes me. from what i hear she doesn't want him talking to me... and he's doing a really good job. whhhyyyy does she dislike me soo much? no clue. i can't get a valid reason. so oh well. i give up on those cases. in other news... bushy and mal are an item. ahhh i'm excited cause she's been lookin for a boy forever and bushy and mark are best buds and mal and i are best buds so it'll be totallywickedcool.

<font size="6" face="arial narrow" color="#c0c0c0">i</font><font size="2" face="arial narrow" color="#ffffff"> pierced bushy's lip friday night with a safety pin. as far as i kno it's still in there. [ew] mt.laurel fest is goin on. i went friday. i tried to play a game where you throw ping pong balls in tiny bowls. if you get them in, you win a bunny. a REAL live bunny. well i tried like 3 times and the guy gave me a fake bunny for bein sucha sport. ;) florida is almost here. i'm getting excited but dread it at the same time. i don't have to drive down now. mark and i went swimming in nasty lake lanier yesterday. then we went to majick dragon and he got his eyebrow pierced. i got my haircut. i was royally pissed. he didn't put highlights in (which i later found out were already paid for by my g-ma) and i specifically told him <font size="4" face="arial narrow" color="#ff00ff">don't cut above my chin!!</font> and what does he do? chop it riiiight off. i almost cried. i hate it. he died it super ugly brown, too. fuck that... i'm goin back to ghetto at home dying. i can do a better job than that guy.
<font size="6" face="arial" color="#66cc33">m</font><font size="2" face="arial" color="#66ffcc">y new journal name and such... old is xmacaronix.

i figure it's been a while since i've wirtten so i will. the car will be fixed monday. *yah!!* mal and i are going to see the grudge sunday. *excitement* i'm so glad james is helping me find my phone. i looked at the COMMUNICATION ARTS photography annual from '97. it's amazing. i want the one from 2004 so very bad. i heard this amazing song called GOD HATES KANSAS, by boys suck. it's amazing. james is bringing my subway for lunch.... period. :P life isn't so bad i suppose.
